rajya sewa krikat tharagawaliyedi janadhipathi aarakshaka kottasaya ha rajarata wishwa widyalaya athara pawathi tharagayen kadulu ataka wishishta jayagrahanayak labimata polis ‘bi’ kandaya yatathe tharaga kala janadhipathi aarakshaka kottasayata haki wiya.mihinthale, rajarata wishwa widyalayiya kridanganayedi pasugiyada pawathi tharagaye palamuwa panduwata pahara dun rajarata wishwa widyalayiya kandayama siyalu dena dawi lakunu 141k ras kara gath athara pilithuru inima krida kala janadhipathi aarakshaka kottasaya kadulu dekak pamanak dawi ilakkaya sampurna kara gaththeya.rajarata wishwa widyalaya siyaludena dawi (oowara 35.4) 141perera 39, kumara 19 (sampath bindusiri 33/4, nuwan 30/3)janadhipathi aarakshaka kottasaya kadulu dekak dawi (oowara 20.5) 142dumnda 66, liyanage 26 (pushpakumara 33/1).

geshawak yanu ganikawak lesa artha kathanaya kala nohakiya.geshawak wima sadaha narthanaya, gayanaya kathandara kime hakiyawa,the uthsawa pilibada danuma aadi bohodewal igena gathayuthuya.aya sabawinma sathkara karanniyaki.samahara geshawan itha dhanawath minisunge aniyam biriyan lesa siti bawa asa atha.geshawak thama aniyam biriyak lesa thaba ganima parani japanaye dhanawathunta abhimanayak genadena karunak wi atha.
me wasara da boliwudaye janapriya tharu ranganayen ek wana balaporoththu thabiya haki sinama nirmana kihipayakma thiragathawimata niyamitha wasaraki.
issarahin penne malu bottuya.
aasana deke bana saha malsara ge dunna . . . !

karmanthashalawen unuunuwe eliyata dapu wahanayak ganna samanya manussayekuta ba .

oya tikath ohomama yan!

meka nam danagaththu ekath watinawa !
ee atharin itha keti kalayakadi minisata wadath samipawa minisa anukaranaya kala pudumakara sathwayek siti.

ratawal 8ka sahabhagithwayen pawathwena dakunu aasiya kantha papandu tharagawaliye shri lankawa sahabhagiwu palamu tharagayen gol 4-0ka pahasu jayak himikara gaththeya.bhuthanayata erehiwa kolambaa si.aar.pitiye eeye pawathi me tharagaye siyaluma gaurawa shri lanka kridikawo ath kara gathha.tharagaye palamu bhagayedi gol 2-0k lesa idiriyen sitimata shri lankawa samathwiya.
aa namin liya thabuwemi.
api dakka pasugiya dawasaka badulla disthrikkaye mahinda rajapaksha mahathage pradhanathwayen pawathi eekabaddha wipakshaye raswima.

rate aarthikaya sambandhayen thama samaga wiwadayakata paminena lesa hitapu janadhipathi menma hitapu mudal amathya, mahinda rajapaksha mahathata abhiyoga karana bawa mudal amathya rawi karunanayaka mahatha pawasayi.
minisun wasa gaththada asa numbae hada asin balana kala me nagenne biththi satharak bawa watahewida kedinaka ho numbaata..
me siddhiya danagath waidyawarayaku apata pawasaddi…
